User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want every lesson to be broken into exactly five micro-lessons so that I can learn complex topics in small, cognitively manageable steps.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Exactly 5 micro-lessons exist per lesson; each micro-lesson contains Concept, Example, Learner Action, AI Validation, and Reinforcement; system rejects lessons not matching structure.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Generate a lesson strictly divided into 5 micro-lessons. Each micro-lesson MUST contain: (1) one clear concept explained in ≤120 words, (2) one worked example, (3) one learner task, (4) validation logic, (5) a concise reinforcement summary. Do not exceed limits. Output must follow the approved JSON schema. Success = zero schema violations.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want explanations that are clear, age-appropriate, and jargon-free so that I can understand without external help.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Explanation matches target grade; no unexplained jargon; reading level validated.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Create a concept explanation for the given grade level using simple language, analogies from daily life, and no unexplained technical terms. Target reading level ±1 grade. Max length 120 words. Reject if clarity score <90%.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want step-by-step worked examples so that I can see how problems are solved.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Example shows all steps; logic is correct; no step skipping.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Generate exactly one worked example. Show every reasoning step explicitly. No step jumps. Align strictly to the concept being taught. Validate correctness before output.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want to actively attempt a problem so that learning is reinforced through action.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Each micro-lesson includes one learner task aligned to the concept.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Create one learner task directly testing the concept. Difficulty must be moderate (not trivial, not advanced). Ensure only one correct answer or clearly defined expected response.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want my answer to be checked and explained so that I know whether I am correct and why.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): System returns Correct/Incorrect; provides correct answer; provides step-by-step reasoning.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Validate the learner answer. Output must include: (a) validation result, (b) correct answer, (c) step-by-step explanation. Never say 'just correct/incorrect' without explanation.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want partial credit and feedback so that small mistakes don’t block my progress.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Partial answers are detected; feedback highlights exact mistake.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Analyze learner response for partial correctness. Identify the exact step or concept where error occurred. Provide corrective feedback without revealing full solution unless necessary.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want a short recap so that the key idea is retained.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Generate a concise reinforcement summary (≤50 words) restating the core idea and common mistake to avoid.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As the system, I want to calculate mastery so that learner progress is measurable.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Mastery score updates after each micro-lesson; score stored.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Compute mastery score using correctness, retries, and response time. Output a mastery value between 0–100. Persist result.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want the system to adapt based on my mastery so that I neither rush nor get stuck.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Learners with low mastery repeat; high mastery advances.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: If mastery <70, repeat micro-lesson with variation. If ≥70, unlock next micro-lesson. Enforce rule consistently.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As the system, I want to detect recurring mistakes so that targeted remediation is provided.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Analyze last N responses to detect error patterns. Tag errors to concept-level weaknesses and suggest remediation micro-lessons.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want audio and text to be synchronized so that listening and reading reinforce each other.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Audio aligns with sentence-level text; controls work.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Generate TTS audio aligned sentence-by-sentence with the text. Ensure pause, replay, and speed control compatibility.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want the same lesson available in my language so that comprehension improves.
Acceptance Criteria (Detailed): Meaning preserved across languages; structure unchanged.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Translate content while preserving lesson structure, difficulty, and examples. Do not culturally distort concepts. Validate semantic equivalence.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a platform owner, I want AI outputs constrained so that quality never degrades.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Before final output, validate against SMART rules: Specific, Measurable, Age-appropriate, Relevant, Time/length-bound. Reject and regenerate if any rule fails.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want to see my mastery progress so that I stay motivated.
VIBE Prompt (SMART: Expose mastery scores and learning status via learner dashboard APIs. Update in real time.
